name: OPERATION BENJAMIN
sampleDescriptions: Outreach to House and Senate offices to educate them about the work Operation Benjamin is doing to properly identify the burial sites of US veterans, and to catalog and archive historical information

Outreach to House and Senate offices to brief them on the work Operation Benjamin is doing to identify Jewish American soldiers buried in US military cemeteries around the world that were mistakenly b
